Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to reporting on certain domestic violence initiatives
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting on certain domestic violence initiatives.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to offering resources and trainings to hairdressers to help them recognize potential signs of domestic violence in their clients
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Offering resources and trainings to hairdressers to help them recognize potential signs of domestic violence in their clients.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign legislation amending the Real Property Law to allow victims of domestic violence to terminate leases upon written notice to landlords
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amending the Real Property Law to allow victims of domestic violence to terminate leases upon written notice to landlords.
